org.apache.arrow.consumers

Class CompositeAvroConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.consumers.CompositeAvroConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class CompositeAvroConsumer
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Composite consumer which hold all consumers. It manages the consume and cleanup process.
